oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The First Fifty Years: A History of MTSC
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pittard, Homer
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Hinton, Nora Smith, illustrator; Smotherman, Bealer, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A history of the Middle Tennessee State College from its founding in 1911 as the Middle Tennessee State Normal School to 1961. Describes the political environment that led to its creation, early organization and administration, students and student activities, faculty and staff, campus planning and construction, etc. Also includes references to the history of the model school that later became the Homer Pittard Campus School

Introduction -- Conception -- Birth -- Staffing the school -- Early Normal years -- Growth and transition -- New status : teachers college -- Troubled years -- New status : state college -- Post war expansion -- At the half century and beyond -- Acknowledgements -- Appendices -- Index.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Middle Tennessee State Normal School--History; Middle Tennessee State College--History; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College--History
